prompt: What is the SQL syntax to connect a database to MindsDB?
What is the SQL command to create a home rentals MindsDB machine learning model?
completion: CREATE MODEL mindsdb.home_rentals_model FROM example_db (SELECT * FROM demo_data.home_rentals) PREDICT rental_price;

prompt: What is the SQL syntax to join input data with predictions from a MindsDB machine learning model?
completion: SELECT t.column_name, p.column_name, ... FROM integration_name.table_name [AS] t JOIN project_name.model_name [AS] p;
